name: Bleeding Neon
description:
A short interactive fiction about searching for the vampires who killed your sister at a neon-soaked club night.

Made for Vampire Jam 2019, 'Bleeding Neon' is a trashy as heck vampire romp inspired by 'The Lost Boys', 'Byzantium', 'Queen of the Damned' and 'Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines'.

A work in progress, unplaytested and probably needs some editing, self-indulgent and melodramatic. Consider yourself warned.

Cover image: Photo by Olivier Collet on Unsplash
